description: Potentially sensitive data stored in SharedPreferences without encryption.
remediation: Use 'flutter_secure_storage' to store sensitive data like tokens or passwords.

description: Sensitive data written to a file without encryption.
remediation: Encrypt data before writing to files using 'encrypt' package or use secure storage.

description: Sensitive data stored in SQLite database without encryption.
remediation: Use an encrypted database solution like 'sqflite_sqlcipher'.

description: Sensitive data written to external/public storage (SD card).
remediation: Do not store sensitive data in external storage. Use internal app storage.

description: Sensitive data stored in cache or temporary directories.
remediation: Avoid storing sensitive data in cache/temp directories as they may be accessible or cleared unexpectedly.

description: Sensitive data stored in WebView localStorage/cookies.
remediation: Avoid passing sensitive data to WebView localStorage. Use platform channels for secure communication.

description: Object containing sensitive fields serialized (JSON) and potentially persisted.
remediation: Exclude sensitive fields from JSON serialization or encrypt them.

description: Sensitive data logged to console or analytics.
remediation: Remove logging of sensitive data in production builds.

description: App data backup includes sensitive information.
remediation: Exclude sensitive files from backups or encrypt them.
